title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register with valid email, username, password, age confirmation, and terms acceptance, and receive a verification email.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Input valid email, username, password, confirm age, accept terms
Submit registration form
Verify success message about verification email sent
Check email inbox for verification email
Verify email contains valid verification link

title: User Registration Validation Errors
description: Verify that the registration form enforces validation and displays appropriate error messages for invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Submit empty form
Verify required field validation errors are shown
Input invalid email format and weak password
Submit registration form
Verify error messages for invalid email and password strength
Deselect age confirmation or terms acceptance
Attempt to submit
Verify validation prevents submission and informs user

title: Email Verification Callback Handling
description: Verify that clicking the verification link updates user session and profile accordingly.

steps.description: Receive verification email and click verification link
Verify user is redirected to verification success page
Verify user session is updated to verified
Attempt login with verified user
Verify login succeeds without verification warnings

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered and verified user can log in with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
Verify user is logged in and directed to main chat interface

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and error message is displayed when incorrect email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input registered email with incorrect password
Click login button
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is shown

title: Password Reset Request and Completion
description: Verify that a user can request a password reset email and successfully set a new password via the reset link.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset request page
Input registered email address
Submit password reset request
Verify success message indicating reset email sent
Check email inbox for password reset email
Click password reset link in email
Input and confirm new password
Submit new password
Verify password successfully updated and user can log in with new password

title: Persistent One-to-One Chat - Sending and Receiving Messages
description: Verify that users can search contacts, open existing or new chat conversations, send messages, and receive real-time updates including read receipts and typing indicators.

steps.description: Log in with a valid user account
Search for an existing contact by username or email
Open an existing one-to-one chat or start a new conversation
Send a text message
Verify message appears immediately in chat with correct timestamp
Verify recipient receives message within 500ms and typing indicator is shown during typing
Recipient sends reply message
Verify read receipts update when messages are read

title: Persistent Chat Message History and Pagination
description: Verify that message history loads correctly with scrolling and pagination, showing messages in correct chronological order.

steps.description: Open a one-to-one chat with an extensive message history
Verify initial message batch loaded is as per design
Scroll up to load older messages
Verify older messages load and display without duplication or gaps
Verify messages are shown in correct chronological order from oldest to newest

title: Anonymous Random Chat - Matching and Temporary Usernames
description: Verify that users joining the random chat queue are matched anonymously within 10 seconds with temporary usernames assigned and messaging is ephemeral.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to random chat mode
Enter random chat queue
Verify user is assigned a temporary username for the session
Verify user is matched with another anonymous user within 10 seconds
Send messages in random chat
Verify messages are received in real-time but are ephemeral and removed after session ends

title: Anonymous Random Chat - Skip and Leave Controls
description: Verify that users in anonymous random chat can use skip and leave options to end or skip the current conversation appropriately.

steps.description: Enter random anonymous chat
Use skip control to leave current conversation and match with next user
Verify previous conversation ends and new anonymous username assigned for the next match
Use leave control to exit random chat mode
Verify user is removed from queue and session terminated

title: User Profile Management - Viewing, Editing, and Account Deletion
description: Verify that users can view their profile details, edit allowed fields, and delete their account with data anonymization.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to user settings
Verify current profile details are displayed correctly
Edit profile fields such as display name or status
Save changes
Verify changes are persisted and reflected in application
Initiate account deletion
Confirm deletion with required warnings
Verify user data is anonymized and account no longer accessible
Attempt to log in with deleted account credentials
Verify login fails with appropriate message

title: Search Functionality - User Search and Conversation Initiation
description: Verify the search functionality to find users by username/email and start new conversations from search results.

steps.description: Navigate to new chat search page
Input valid partial and full search terms
Verify search returns matching users accurately with relevant details
Select a user from search results
Verify a chat conversation is created or opened with that user
Verify user cannot start chat with themselves

title: Contact Blocking and Muting Effects
description: Verify that blocking a user prevents all communications and removes them from search and matching, and muting a user prevents notifications without blocking messages.

steps.description: Block a contact from chat or profile
Verify blocked user cannot send or receive messages with blocker
Verify blocked user does not appear in search results or random matching for blocker
Mute a non-blocked contact
Verify muted user messages are still received but notifications are not shown

title: Moderation System - Profanity Filtering and Reporting
description: Verify that the automated profanity filter blocks inappropriate content and that users can manually report abusive behavior with contextual data submitted to moderation queue.

steps.description: Attempt sending messages with profane or banned words
Verify messages are blocked or sanitized before sending in both persistent and random chats
Trigger repeated violations
Verify automatic temporary restrictions are applied per policy
Use report feature to report abusive user with context in a conversation
Verify report submission succeeds and includes contextual information

title: Browser Push and In-App Notifications Respecting Preferences
description: Verify that users receive browser push and in-app notifications for new messages, reports, and system alerts according to their configurable preferences.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to notification settings
Toggle various notification preferences on and off
Trigger events that generate notifications (e.g. new messages, reports)
Verify notifications are shown or suppressed per user settings
Verify notifications are actionable and redirect to appropriate context on click

title: Appearance and Privacy Settings - Theme and Status Visibility
description: Verify that users can toggle appearance themes and configure online status visibility and random chat opt-out, with immediate and persistent effect.

steps.description: Navigate to appearance and privacy settings
Toggle between light and dark themes
Verify theme changes apply immediately throughout the app
Set online status visibility to visible and invisible
Verify changes reflect correctly and persist on reload
Opt-out from anonymous random chat mode
Verify user is excluded from random chat matching

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify that the application meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through main application screens using only keyboard inputs
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard
Use screen reader to navigate pages and access chat functions
Verify screen reader announces all elements with correct labels and states
Test color contrast ratios of UI elements
Verify color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA minimum standards

title: Performance Testing - Real-Time Messaging Latency
description: Verify that real-time messages, including typing indicators and read receipts, are transmitted and received within 500 milliseconds under normal load.

steps.description: Establish one-to-one chat session between two users
Send multiple messages sequentially from sender to receiver
Measure and verify message latency is less than or equal to 500ms
Type and observe typing indications on both sides
Verify typing indicators update in real-time within latency threshold
Read messages on receiver side
Verify read receipts update within 500ms

title: Scalability - Handling High User and Message Volume
description: Verify application stability and responsiveness when handling a large number of concurrent users and high message throughput.

steps.description: Simulate environment with thousands of concurrent users in chat
Generate high volume of messages in both persistent and random chat modes
Verify application remains responsive and latency remains within acceptable limits
Verify no data loss or message order violations occur
